   19: %%
   20: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
   21: %%% Purpose: Test the support for application upgrade/code_change test
   22: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   23: -module(release_test_SUITE).
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: -compile(export_all).
   27: 
   28: -define(APP,runtime_tools). % "randomly" selected 'application under test'
   29: 
   30: %%
   31: %% all/1
   32: %%
   33: all() ->
   34:     [minor,
   35:      major,
   36:      major_fail_init,
   37:      major_fail_upgraded,
   38:      major_fail_downgraded,
   39:      major_fail_no_init].
   40: 
   41: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   42:     Config.
   43: 
   44: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   45:     ok.
   46: 
   47: init_per_testcase(major_fail_no_init, Config) ->
   48:     Config;
   49: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   50:     Config1 = ct_release_test:init(Config),
   51:     ct:log("ct_release_test:init/1 returned:~n~p",[Config1]),
   52:     Config1.
   53: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   54:     ct_release_test:cleanup(Config).
   55: 
   56: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   57: %%% Test cases
   58: minor(Config) ->
   59:     ct_release_test:upgrade(?APP,minor,{?MODULE,[]},Config).
   60: 
   61: major(Config) ->
   62:     ct_release_test:upgrade(?APP,major,{?MODULE,[]},Config).
   63: 
   64: major_fail_init(Config) ->
   65:     try ct_release_test:upgrade(?APP,major,{?MODULE,fail_init},Config)
   66:     catch exit:{test_case_failed,
   67: 		{test_upgrade_callback,_Mod,_Func,_Args,
   68: 		 {'EXIT',{test_case_failed,upgrade_init_failed}}}} ->
   69: 	    ok
   70:     end.
   71: 
   72: major_fail_upgraded(Config) ->
   73:     try ct_release_test:upgrade(?APP,major,{?MODULE,fail_upgraded},Config)
   74:     catch exit:{test_case_failed,
   75: 		{test_upgrade_callback,_Mod,_Func,_Args,
   76: 		 {'EXIT',{test_case_failed,upgrade_upgraded_failed}}}} ->
   77: 	    ok
   78:     end.
   79: 
   80: major_fail_downgraded(Config) ->
   81:     try ct_release_test:upgrade(?APP,major,{?MODULE,fail_downgraded},Config)
   82:     catch exit:{test_case_failed,
   83: 		{test_upgrade_callback,_Mod,_Func,_Args,
   84: 		 {'EXIT',{test_case_failed,upgrade_downgraded_failed}}}} ->
   85: 	    ok
   86:     end.
   87: 
   88: major_fail_no_init(Config) ->
   89:     try ct_release_test:upgrade(?APP,major,[],Config)
   90:     catch exit:{test_case_failed,"ct_release_test:init/1 not run"} ->
   91: 	    ok
   92:     end.
   93: 
   94: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   95: %%% ct_release_test callbacks
   96: 
   97: %% Version numbers are checked by ct_release_test, so there is nothing
   98: %% more to check here...
   99: upgrade_init(CtData,fail_init) ->
  100:     ct:fail(upgrade_init_failed);
  101: upgrade_init(CtData,State) ->
  102:     {ok,{FromVsn,ToVsn}} = ct_release_test:get_app_vsns(CtData,?APP),
  103:     case ct_release_test:get_appup(CtData,?APP) of
  104: 	{ok,{FromVsn,ToVsn,UpInstrs,DownInstrs}} ->
  105: 	    io:format("Upgrade/downgrade ~p: ~p <--> ~p~n"
  106: 		      "Upgrade instructions:   ~p~n"
  107: 		      "Downgrade instructions: ~p",
  108: 		      [?APP,FromVsn,ToVsn,UpInstrs,DownInstrs]);
  109: 	{error,{vsn_not_found,_}} when FromVsn==ToVsn ->
  110: 	    io:format("No upgrade test for ~p, same version",[?APP])
  111:     end,
  112:     State.
  113: upgrade_upgraded(CtData,fail_upgraded) ->
  114:     ct:fail(upgrade_upgraded_failed);
  115: upgrade_upgraded(_CtData,State) ->
  116:     State.
  117: upgrade_downgraded(CtData,fail_downgraded) ->
  118:     ct:fail(upgrade_downgraded_failed);
  119: upgrade_downgraded(_CtData,State) ->
  120:     State.
